title: Remove PositionEntryForm from Dashboard, keep only Import from Binance

requirements.text: Remove the PositionEntryForm component from the Dashboard tab (frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx). The form and its associated 'Add Position' UI must no longer be rendered anywhere in the Dashboard tab. The only way to add positions to the dashboard must be via the existing 'Import from Binance' button. Do not remove the PositionEntryForm component file itself — only stop rendering it in DashboardTab.tsx.
acceptanceCriteria: The PositionEntryForm is no longer visible in the Dashboard tab under any circumstance.
The 'Import from Binance' button remains present and functional in the Dashboard tab when credentials are configured.
The PositionDashboard (active positions list with real-time PnL) and TotalCapitalSummary card remain fully visible and functional.
No layout shifts or empty whitespace appear where the form previously existed.
The PositionEntryForm component file (frontend/src/components/PositionEntryForm.tsx) is not deleted — only its usage in DashboardTab.tsx is removed.
If no positions are present, the PositionDashboard empty state still prompts the user to import from Binance instead of adding manually.

constraints: Do not delete the PositionEntryForm component file — only remove it from DashboardTab.tsx.
Do not alter the 'Import from Binance' button logic or visibility conditions.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Removing the PositionEntryForm from any other location (it is only used in DashboardTab.tsx).
Redesigning the Dashboard tab layout beyond removing the form.
Changing the Binance import logic or credential handling.
Adding any new way to manually enter positions.
